column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nsuasua Nyankopɔn
column3: dɛ hom yɛ ne mba a ɔdɔ hom;"

column2: "na hom nnantsew ɔdɔ mu
column3: dɛ mbrɛ Kraest so dɔɔ hom
column4: na ɔdze noho mae maa hɛn
column5: dɛ ayɛyɛdze nye afɔrbɔdze a otu nka huahuam ma Nyankopɔn no."

column2: "Dɛ hom yɛ ahotseweefo yi
column3: mma wɔmmbɔ ndwamansɛm anaa efifidze anaa enyiber dzin mpo wɔ hom mu."

column2: "Mma hom mma ɔbra a ɔmmfata
column3: anaa kasafi
column4: anaa fɛwdzi a ɔnnyɛ mfaso mmpue hom mu: na mbom hom nda Nyankopɔn ase."

column2: "Na hom nhu iyi pefee dɛ edwaman biara
column3: obiara a ɔyɛ efifidze anaa onyiberfo (ɔno nye dɛ ɔbosonsɔrnyi) nnyi egyapadze wɔ Kraest nye Nyankopɔn ahendzi no mu."

column2: "Mma obi mmfa nsɛnhun nndaadaa hom: na dɛm ndzɛmba yi ntsi na Nyankopɔn ebufuw reba hɔn wɔyɛ asoɔdzen no do."
"Dɛm ntsi mma hom nye hɔn nnya anyɛnkofa biara:"
"na nkan no nkyɛ hom yɛ sum
column3: na afei dze
column4: hom yɛ kan wɔ Ewuradze mu; dɛm ntsi hom nnantsew dɛ hɔn a wɔwɔ kan:"

column2: "(osiandɛ kan no n'aba wɔ papayɛ nye tsenenee nye nokwar nyina mu)
column4: "hom nsɔ dza ɔsɔ Ewuradze enyi yie nhwɛ;"

column2: "na mma hom nnye sum edwuma a ɔnnsow aba no nnyɛ nyɛnko
column3: na mbom hom ntsia;"

column2: "na dza wɔyɛ no nsumaa mu no ɔyɛ enyito dɛ wɔbɔ dzin mpo."
"Na ndzɛmba biara a kan no da no edzi no bɛyɛ kan ma wohu."
"Dɛm ntsi ɔse
column3: Nyan
column4: ɔwo a ada! Soɛr fi ewufo mu

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nhwɛ yie mbrɛ hom si nantsew
column3: nnyɛ dɛ nkwasea na mbom dɛ enyansafo;"

column2: "hom mfa mber a hom nya no ndzi dwuma pa
column3: osiandɛ mber no yɛ mber bɔn."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mma hom nnyɛ nkwasea
column3: na mbom hom nhu dza Ewuradze pɛ."

column2: "Eso mma hom mmbow nsa; osiandɛ ɔno na ɔdze sakasakayɛ ba
column3: na mbom hom mma Sunsum no nhyɛ hom ma;"

column2: "ber a hom dze nsankudwom
column3: ayɛyindwom nye sunsum mu ndwom rekasa kyerɛ homho no
column4: na hom mfa hom akoma ntow ndwom enyigye mu mma Ewuradze."

column2: "Adze nyina mu no
column3: hom nda Nyankopɔn Egya no ase daa wɔ Jesus Kraest dzin mu."

column2: "Hom mfa Kraest mu suro mbrɛ homho adze mmema homho nkorkor."
"Yernom
column3: hom mbrɛ homho adze mma homankasa hom kunnom dɛ hom dze ma Ewuradze."

column2: "Na okun no yɛ yer no ne tsir dɛ mbrɛ Kraest so yɛ asɔr no ne tsir
column3: ɔno a ɔyɛ ne nyimpadua n'agyenkwa no."

column2: "Na dɛ mbrɛ asɔr brɛ noho adze ma Kraest no
column3: dɛmara na yernom so nyɛ mma hɔn kunnom wɔ adze nyina mu."

column2: "Kunnom
column3: hom ndɔ hom yernom dɛ mbrɛ Kraest so dɔɔ asɔr no
column4: na ɔdze no nkwa too hɔ maa no no:"

column2: "ama ɔayɛ no krɔnkrɔn
column3: dɛ ɔdze nsuguar no atsew ho wɔ asɛm no mu
column5: "ama oeetu asɔr no esi hɔ ama nankasa noho
column6: dɛ enyimnyam asɔr a onnyi nkekaa anaa mpomponee
column8: na mbom ɔyɛ krɔnkrɔn na onndzii dzɛm."

column2: "Dɛmara na ɔsɛ dɛ kunnom dɔ hɔnankasa hɔn yernom
column3: dɛ hɔnankasa hɔn honam. Nyia ɔdɔ nankasa ne yer no

column2: "osiandɛ obiara nntan nankasa no honam pɛn
column3: na mbom ɔnyɛn no na ɔhwɛ no yie
column4: dɛ mbrɛ Kraest so yɛ ma asɔr no;"

column2: "na yɛyɛ ne nyimpadua ho akwaa."
"Iyi ntsi na banyin begya n'egya nye ne na hɔ
column3: na ɔdze noho akɛbata ne yer ho
column4: na hɔn beenu no ayɛ honankor."

column2: "Esumasɛm yi so: na emi dze maka no Kraest nye asɔr no ho."
"Na hom so
column3: obiara ndɔ nankasa ne yer dɛ mbrɛ ɔdɔ nankasa noho
column4: na ɔyer so ondzi no kun nyi."
